settings.helpText: This is the name of the piece of content for identification within Contentful - use sensible names e.g. Product Page Meta Data.
Defaults to the Page display name if left empty
Can appear alongside the Browser title in search engine results.
Used by Facebook to present a preview of a link. If undefined this will default to the page title.
The description to be displayed on Facebook as part of a link preview. If left blank, will default to Page description.

The image to be displayed on Facebook as part of a link preview. If left blank, no image will be displayed. For image size recommendations see; https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sharing/best-practices#images
Used by Twitter to present a preview of a link. Defaults to OG Title then to Page Title if undefined.
Used by Twitter to present a preview of a link. Defaults to OG Description then to Page Description if undefined.
Used by Twitter to present a preview of a link.
If selected will instruct crawlers not to index the page. Defaults to Index.
If selected will instruct crawlers not to follow and index any hyperlinks. Defaults to FOLLOW.
Default; 'daily' if omitted. The value "never" should be used to describe archived URLs. Please note that the value of this tag is considered a hint and not a command
Default; Calculated from site-tree if omitted. Use to promote important pages to a higher priority. Lets the search engines know which pages you deem most important for the crawlers.
